projects.name: Translation app
projects.description: Turn text into American Sign Language.
projects.overview: Type in text and receive corresponding ASL interpretation. React assignment during frontend training period by Noroff.

projects.name: Pokemon Trainer
projects.overview: Sort of pokedex for browsing and keeping a track of Pokemons that you've encountered. Angular assignment during frontend training period by Noroff.

projects.name: Boxinator
projects.description: Need a box? Order a box!
projects.overview: Fullstack assignment during Noroff training period. You can order mysterious boxes and you will receive email confirmations for each step. Project was made by a group of 4 developers.

projects.name: Movie Characters API
projects.description: API for storing movies, characters and franchises. Full CRUD functionality
projects.overview: Type in text and receive corresponding ASL interpretation. Fullstack assignment during Noroff training period.

projects.name: Amandus
projects.description: Robot Framework web editor and integrated git environment on the go
projects.overview: This is the software engineering project by University of Helsinki for Eficode. You can synchronize your repositories from GitHub, GitLab and BitBucket in order to edit your Robot Framework test files on this editor. Editor is capable of all common git operations including solving merge conflicts. Project group consisted of 6 developers, everybody investing over 200 hours of work to this project while maintaining agile development processes.

projects.name: Rate a repository
projects.description: Browse and rate repositories on your Android phone

projects.name: Showcase
projects.overview: A site I built to showcase my projects.
